about_the_game:
DON'T BLINK

Versus in the Dark is a high-speed platform fighter where everyone’s invisible! Watch your step while keeping eyes on your opponents, lest they strike from the shadows to be cut in half.

SEE, SLASH & DISAPPEAR

Hide yourself and use the environment to trap your opponents without backfiring. Sky-ripping thunderstorms, a flickering light, the snow piling up on you or even a simple door opening could reveal your position to other players.

SIMPLE & DEEP

Three buttons, no combos, no life bar—just one-hit kills! Simple and easy to play, enjoyable for everyone in a few seconds. Master the art of invisibility in strategic and nervous battles mixing platforming, stealth, and swordplay with lightsaber katana.

ONLINE + COUCH

Up to 4 players, free-for-all and team play. Play with your friends or versus the world ! Feel the thrill of being the last man standing.



  • 🥷Play INVISIBLE NINJA and trap you opponents in a unique platform fighter game.
  • 🕹️EASY TO PICK UP, HARD TO MASTER. Everyone can play and enjoy !
  • 🎨A stylish PIXEL ART STYLE mixing feudal Japanese and street culture, where torii gates are illuminated by neon lights.
  • 👺 Customize your ninja with tons of MASKS & HATS then battle across one of the 50 maps showcasing unique ways to play and stay invisible.
  • 🌐Last man standing, Capture the lantern, Team play... Up to 5 customizable game modes to play ONLINE AND LOCALLY
  • 🗡️LIGHTSABER KATANA Because regular ones are …. boring?

--
Controller is required for local multiplayer. We support a variety of controllers including Xbox, PlayStation, Switch and many more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is required for local multiplayer / local coop
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is required for local multiplayer / local coop
